mapper.select: select orders_no, product_name, detail_price, order_state, order_manage_date, name, image_name from order_views where thumbNail = 1 and seller_no =${sellerNo} order By order_manage_date
select category_name, nvl(sum(detail_price),0) as tot, count(*) as cnt from orders_views where order_state >=3 and seller_no=#{sellerNo} group by category_name
